Posts.Content: I know some of you from the old ivillage board.  I have ovarian cancer as does a friend of mine.  She is now taking Femara because three chemos have failed her.  Her doctor told her that her cancer was estrogen receptive, but now she has her pathology:
Posts.Title: Could Someone Help Me With These Terms?

Posts.Content: Deb, that is totally unconscionable that those programs would be cut and the limit of $900 lowered to $500.  Your governor wil literally be killing people who find themselves uninsured or poor or both.  I hope you get somewhere with your class action suit.  Ellen who followed the ivillage group and who still knows many of you, but with ovarian cancer
Posts.Title: Mo Gov wins....medicaid/medicare recipients lose
The preliminary reports are in: my mom has ovarian cancer.

Posts.Content: To reintroduce myself, I know many of you from the old ivillage board.  Glynne and I would come over from ovarian cancer to be with you.
Posts.Title: Lump vs. Lesion--Any Difference?

Posts.Content: Thanks for your replies.  I'm still quite worried about her of course.  I would refer her here if she were diagnosed, but I am so hoping that I don't have to.
Posts.Title: Lump vs. Lesion--Any Difference?

Posts.Content: Ellen, 60, Madison, WI.  Ovarian Cancer Stage 3C; in second recurrence and chemo failing.  Met most of you in another village and follow you but rarely post.
